title: Vaccinations
description: Find out which vaccinations are offered on the NHS, what age you should ideally have them, and why they are safe and important.
cleaned_text: - [Why vaccination is safe and important](/conditions/vaccinations/why-vaccination-is-safe-and-important/) Includes how vaccines work, what they contain and the common side effects. - [NHS vaccinations and when to have them](/conditions/vaccinations/nhs-vaccinations-and-when-to-have-them/) Includes a list of all the vaccines available on the NHS and who should have them. Vaccinations This guide can help you understand the vaccines offered in the UK and when to have them. It also explains how they work and why they're safe and important. There's separate information on coronavirus
